rules_text:
If one or more +1/+1 counters would be placed on another creature you control, that many plus one +1/+1 counters are placed on it instead.
Reborn 1–{3}{W}{W}{W} [i](You may cast this card from your graveyard for it’s reborn cost. If you do, it enters the battlefield with an additional +1/+1 counter on it and becomes reborn. When it dies while reborn, exile it.)[/i]
notes:
2k17
Cost: 3WW > 1WW
Outlast 1WW > Reborn 1—3WWW

fluffy: Hardened Scales wording for this
